name: Target Shootout (Zeathus)
description:
Your goal is to dodge the arrows for as long as possible. If you lose 1 heart you become faster, if you lose 2 hearts you gain the ability to pause time and if you lose all 3 hearts you lose.

CONTROLS -------------------------

WASD / Arrow Keys -- Movement

Space  - Pause time for 2 seconds

-----------------------------------------

This game was made in 3 hours, with a new theme every 1 hour. The three chosen themes were: "Survive", "Every death is meaningful", "A small world".
